actions.text: On agreeing to the Hoekstra amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.

description: Amendment sought to reallocate Corporation for National and Community Service funding by increasing Americorps grants funding by $30 million and deleting funding for quality and innovation grants accordingly.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 18 in the Congressional Record of June 19, 1996 to delete $30 million in funds appropriated in the bill for AmeriCorps for operating expenses and to increase the appropriation for Americorps funding for general grants commensurately.
